alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Hudson; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, eastern Passaic, southwestern Bergen and Essex Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Caldwell, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paterson, Passaic, Wayne, Bloomfield, Hackensack, Orange, Paramus, Ridgewood, Lyndhurst, Millburn, Rutherford, Secaucus, Harrison, Ridgefield and Caldwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Hudson; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Union
